posts.post_content:
I am selling the following T206's to make some space for some new pursuits.  I prefer paypal gift/payment owed.  All prices are dlvd.  Please contact me via email at [url]rdamboise4@gmail.com[/url] if interested.  These are all pretty nice cards and should make nice additions to someones collection:

t206 Portrait Bresnahan St. Louis Piedmont 150 Subjects VG $65
